name: Satellite Smash
description:
You have always wanted to take over planet Earth and now is your chance. Fly through space and destroy the satellites in the Earth's orbit. This will crash the Earth's communication systems and other information they gather from them. Be careful though, you need to conserve your fuel and dodge Earth's defenses. 

Hold W to accelerate towards the mouse cursor.

Satellite Smash was developed over the course of a week with the theme of , "Play as the Villain" for the 61st Untitled Game Jam.

All art, code and audio developed by me.

Unfortunately the font wasn't made by me - Made by CodeMan38 - https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Press+Start+2P#about

Have Fun!
